| History                 = The [[Homo Superior|mutant]] [[Infectia (Josephine) (Earth-616)|Infectia]] met men and brought them home, with the intention of mutating them. After being mutated, the men would have a limited life-span, but with powers similar to mutants.{{r|X-Factor Vol 1 29}}

The Anti-Bodies were a group of men that she used to unsuccessfully attempt to capture [[X-Factor (Earth-616)|X-Factor]]'s [[Prosh (Earth-616)|Ship]]. After the initial battle, [[Jean Grey (Earth-616)|Marvel Girl]] unleashed a massive amount of [[Telekinesis|telekinesis]], fatally speeding the Anti-Bodies' metabolism and decomposing them in a matter of seconds.{{r|X-Factor Vol 1 29}}
